snippet: New viewing technologies have allowed fans of television series like “Arrested Development” and “Game of Thrones” to completely revise the sequence of scenes and then repost the series online.
abstract: New digital viewing technologies are allowing fans of television series like Arrested Development and Game of Thrones to completely revise the sequence of scenes and then repost the series online.
lead_paragraph: New viewing technologies have allowed fans of television series like “Arrested Development” and “Game of Thrones” to completely revise the sequence of scenes and then repost the series online.

headline.seo: ‘Arrested Development’ and Game of Thrones,’ the Fans’ Cut
headline.main: In a Twist on the Remix, Fans Recut TV Series
headline.print_headline: In a Twist on the Remix, Fans Recut TV Series
